body.name: Elegant Comfort 100% Cotton Shell Stripe Hotel Pillows, Super Plush Bed Pillows for Side Back & Stomach Sleepers, Cooling Gel-Infused Filling, 2-PACK Standard/Queen Pillow Set, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 26 mins
features: SUPER PLUSH MATERIAL- Measuring 20 x 28 inches, our Standard/Queen size hotel-quality pillows are encased in a soft and luxurious 100% Cotton Shell. Mimicking the feel of real goose down, they are stuffed with airy gel infused down-alternative. Promising easy bounce-back performance and respond to your movements throught the night. No matter your position, you will have an adaptive sleeping surface. Ideal for any bed room and the perfect gift idea for your friends and family.

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP- Crafted to guarantee proper neck alignment. The perfect balance of comfort and support while maintaining an aligned spine, resulting in a restful night's sleep. Generously stuffed, promising a plump and medium-firm finish for ultimate support. Our breathable weave allows air flow through to keep you cool night after night. Wicks moisture, bringing a never-before slumber experience. Stylish, luxurious, and a comfortable boost for your rest area. Pair them with a set of our pillow cases to match the season, style, or your mood. Fade-proof and easy to clean fabric.

PACKAGING- For shipping purposes, pillows will be vacuum sealed. Please allow at least 24 hours for your pillows to expand and to absorb air before use. These pillows will be tight stitched with upgraded and durable material to ensure longevity. All your pillows will be well-stuffed and can maintain suitable softness while having sufficient support.

EASY, SIMPLE, STRAIGHTFORWARD- Elegant Comfort pillows are fade and stain resistant. If cared for correctly, your pillow set can last years without any visible wear and tear. Place your pillow in the washing machine. Using cool water, wash with minimal detergent on a gentle cycle. Run the rinse cycle twice. Tumble dry low (or air dry). DO NOT BLEACH. Allow pillows to fully dry before continued use.

OEKO-TEX 100 STANDARD CERTIFIED- All our products are STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX. According to the guidelines, these products are tested for harmful substances and produced in an environmentally friendly and socially responsible manner. Each fabric batch is also tested for various durability features such as no-pilling, low shrinkage, color fastness, etc. Then they are stitched, individually inspected to be defect free and finally, packed for sales.
body.description: Change your sleeping experience with Elegant Comfort 2-Piece Striped Pillow Set. These soft, cozy, and super plush pillows feature a classy striped design for a sophisticated and modern finish. Available in two sizes to coordinate with your interior design. Unique, clump resisting fill that allows you to bring your pillow back to life with a quick fluff. Elegant Comfort hotel-quality pillows are encased in a soft and luxurious 100% Cotton. Quality craftsmanship that responds to your movements. Mimicking the feel of real goose down, they are stuffed with airy gel infused down-alternative, making it the perfect pillow to keep you cool night after night. Extra firm stitching to prevent filling from shifting and bunching. Generously stuffed for a medium firm feel. Designed for both immediate and lasting comfort and support. Easy, simple, and straightforward clean-up. Please note that your pillow set will be vacuum sealed upon arrival. For the ultimate night's rest, allow up to 24-hours for your pillows to fully fluff. Keep in mind it may take two weeks to acclimate to your new pillow set. All our products are OEKO-TEX 100 STANDARD CERTIFIED.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We import many items from many different countries such as China, India, Pakistan, Turkey, Egypt and Portugal. Elegant Comfort's reputation for consistent quality, innovative design, and reliability have enabled the company to grow and flourish in a market that has seen major changes in the participants as well as distribution. Our main products includes home collection and hotel collection such as: sheet sets, duvet cover sets, comforter sets, quilted coverlet sets, bed skirts, decorative pillows, memory foam products, throw & blankets, mattress pads, mattress protectors, furniture protectors, bed ensembles, bed in a bag, and shower curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good pillow, stiff but soft.
reviews.reviewText: I was at first confused; for the purposes of shipping the pillows had been compressed and vacuum sealed. But after removing them from the packaging, the pillows fluffed right up. The pillows are good support for when I sleep on my side, which is most of the time. Happy enough with them that I bought a second pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect pillow. Ordered them to be delivered to my son's house for an upcoming trip. He had no bedding for the Guest bedroom. The quality was excellent. Very comfortable. I slept well. The firmness was just right not too hard not too soft. Five stars would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been through a lot of pillows. I’m a side sleeper. A lot of pillows don’t have the support I need, leaving me with neck pain. These pillows are great. Firm enough for my side position yet not too high when I sleep on my back. I will definitely be buying more of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a heavy pillow
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality pillow but VERY HEAVY ! Would be hard to wash not to mention drying it I would imagine . Offers good support .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good support
reviews.reviewText: Good thick and supportive pillow. Much better than what I've purchased at department stores in the past

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are the bomb!!!!! they hold their shape, offer great support and are all around divine. I ordered a set for my adult daughter for a bithday present because they are so awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect pillow
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how wonderful these pillows are! I am a stomach sleeper and it is nearly impossible to find comfortable pillows. I was hesitant when ordering as the pillows looked to tall but I figured if they did not work for both my husband and myself, at least they would work for him. I was pleasantly surprised. I have gotten a full night's sleep for the first time in quite a long time! Ordering another set today as replacements for when these might need replacing. I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality. Fluffed up nicely. Greater than expected.
